title: Twitter : number of monetizable daily active U.S. users 2017 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monetizable daily active users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monetizable daily active users in millions for 12 number of Quarters.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
The difference of Number of monetizable daily active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 6.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monetizable daily active users in millions for 12 number of Quarters.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
The difference of Number of monetizable daily active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 6.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions and Q4 '17 has the lowest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
The minimum Quarter Q4 '17 has got 1.24 times less Number of monetizable daily active users in millions than the maximum Quarter Q4 '19.
Number of monetizable daily active users in millions at Quarter Q4 '19 is 31.0 , second place is Q3 '19 at 30.0, and thirdly is Q2 '19 at 29.0.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions has lowered over the past 12 Quarters.
Similar Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is found in Quarter Q3 '18, Q2 '18, Q1 '18, Q3 '17, and Q1 '17.
The Quarter Q4 '17 tends to be 1.14 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 325.0.
